sourcesContent:
<template>
  <input type="text" name="search" id="search" ref="input" />
  <button @click="search">HA</button>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  props: {
    navTitle: String,
    navSubTitle: String,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      allCountries: [],
      countries: [],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    searchResults(search = "all") {
      axios
        .get(
          // `https://restcountries.com/v3.1/${
          //   this.$refs.input.value == "" ? "all" : "name/" + search
          // }`
          `https://restcountries.com/v3.1/name/${search}`
        )
        .then((response) => {
          this.countries = response.data;
          for (let i = 0; i < 10 && i < this.countries.length; i++) {
            this.allCountries.push(this.countries[i]);
          }
        });
      return this.allCountries;
    },
    search() {
      if (this.$refs.input == "") {
        this.searchResults();
      } else {
        this.searchResults(this.$refs.input.value);
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>
nav {
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100vw;
  background: #081101;
}

a {
  display: flex;
  align-self: flex-start;
  text-decoration: none;
  text-align: left;
}

a > span {
  color: #aceca1;
  font-size: 1.35rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  padding: 0.85rem;
}
</style>
